abstract: Carl C. Icahn said on Monday that he had signed a confidentiality agreement with Dell Inc., potentially heading off a confrontation over its $24.4 billion sale.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn said on Monday that he had signed a confidentiality agreement with Dell Inc., potentially heading off a confrontation over its $24.4 billion sale.
lead_paragraph: Dell Inc. has agreed to open its books to the activist investor Carl C. Icahn, signaling a possible truce on one front in the battle over the computer maker’s proposed $24.4 billion buyout.

headline.main: Dell Agrees to Open Its Books to Icahn
headline.print_headline: Dell Agrees To Show Financials To Icahn

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
